questions.question: Ends of the specimen should be plain.

explanations.b: Ends of the specimen should be plain because the ends are tested on a bearing plate.

questions.question: In universal testing machine, for a circular section specimen, the gauge length is taken to be ______________ where A is the area of cross section of the specimen.

explanations.c: It is the formula to find the gauge length when we have the area of the specimen.

questions.question: In the compression test on mild steel, the ultimate strength of a specimen 1 with cross sectional area A is obtained as T.A specimen 2 of mild steel with cross sectional area 2A and height of the specimen same as the specimen 1 compression test is conducted. The ultimate strength of the specimen 2 is

explanations.c: Ultimate strength is property of material , the change in dimension does not affect the ultimate strength.
